text: Pusan National University Yangsan Campus Station () is a station on the Busan Metro Line 2 in Mulgeum-eup, Yangsan, South Gyeongsang, South Korea. ==History== Its name was originally Yangsan Pusan National University Hospital, but it was changed as of January 10, 2009. Trains previously didn't stop at the station from January 10, 2008 until it was opened on October 1, 2009. ==Nearby places== A shuttle bus connects the station to Yangsan Pusan National University Hospital. * Yangsan Busan National University Hospital * Busan National University Dental Hospital *Busan Institute of Scientific Investigation ==References== ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Metro stations in Yangsan Category:Railway stations opened in 2009
title: Pusan National University Yangsan Campus station
